testcase.name: Validate sample test API
testcase.system-out: Given User make a call to api "https://open.er-api.com/v6/latest/USD".......passed When verify the api status as "success".....................................passed Then verify USD price against the AED between 3.6 and 3.7...................passed Then verify the api response time is not less then 3 seconds................passed Then verify total currency paires returned as 162...........................passed
